sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Building, GraduationCap, Users, Search, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; const UserTypeSelection: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const userTypes = [ { id: 'government', title: 'Government', description: 'Manage and verify official certificates', icon: Building, color: 'bg-blue-50 text-blue-600', iconColor: 'bg-blue-100', borderColor: 'border-blue-200', hoverColor: 'hover:border-blue-300', nextStep: 'login' }, { id: 'institute', title: 'Institute', description: 'Issue and manage student certificates', icon: GraduationCap, color: 'bg-green-50 text-green-600', iconColor: 'bg-green-100', borderColor: 'border-green-200', hoverColor: 'hover:border-green-300', nextStep: 'register' }, { id: 'student', title: 'Student', description: 'View and share your certificates', icon: Users, color: 'bg-purple-50 text-purple-600', iconColor: 'bg-purple-100', borderColor: 'border-purple-200', hoverColor: 'hover:border-purple-300', nextStep: 'login' }, { id: 'recruiter', title: 'Recruiter/Verifier', description: 'Verify candidate certificates', icon: Search, color: 'bg-orange-50 text-orange-600', iconColor: 'bg-orange-100', borderColor: 'border-orange-200', hoverColor: 'hover:border-orange-300', nextStep: 'register' } ]; const handleUserTypeSelect = (userType: string, nextStep: string) => { if (nextStep === 'register') { navigate(`/register/${userType}`); } else { navigate(`/login/${userType}`); } }; return (

Choose Your User Type

Select your role to access the appropriate features and dashboard.

{userTypes.map((type) => (
handleUserTypeSelect(type.id)} className={`relative p-6 rounded-xl border-2 ${type.borderColor} ${type.hoverColor} bg-white cursor-pointer transition-all duration-200 hover:shadow-lg`} >

{type.title}

{type.description}

Select
))}
{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.number}

{stat.label}

))}
{/* Process Section */}

How It Works

Simple steps to get started with CERTI-TRUST

1

Choose Your Role

Select from Government, Institute, Student, or Recruiter/Verifier

2

Register or Login

Create your account or sign in with existing credentials

3

Start Using

Access your personalized dashboard and begin verification

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Choose your user type above to begin your journey with CERTI-TRUST

); }; export default UserTypeSelection;
